revised_title: Obituary of Sir Arthur Shipley: A Pioneering Zoologist and Parasitologist
tldr: The article is an obituary for Sir Arthur Shipley, a prominent zoologist and parasitologist. Shipley made significant contributions to the fields of zoology, parasitic worms, and entomology. He was a dedicated teacher, researcher, and writer who emphasized the importance of biological knowledge in practical applications, such as agriculture, health, and disease. Shipley served in various capacities in scientific organizations and was a member of several learned societies.
